name: Soul Candy
description:
Candy, demons, neighbors!

On one lonely Halloween night, Taffy plays with an ouija board as a last resort to their boredom. Unfortunately, they summoned a demon who snatched their soul! Now they gotta visit all their odd neighbors and get some treats in exchange for their life force. The night just couldn't get any sweeter...

Features

- A spooky little game, about 10 minutes of playtime

- Weird neighbors who definitely don't exist in real life

- Rats??

- 4 endings! 

- The grooviest music (seriously, it's pretty great)

If you catch any bugs, don't be afraid to let me know in the comments!

This game has not yet been tested on Mac
